valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 26 Aug 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 27 Aug 2025
general_synopsis: Developing Atlantic low moving rapidly eastwards, expected Shannon 993 by midnight tonight

Weather
In south, showers, rain later. In north, rain or squally showers, perhaps thundery.

Moderate or good.
